name: Name
privacy_purpose_desc: Sonaverse Co., Ltd. processes personal information for the following purposes and does not use it for any purpose other than the following purposes.
privacy_retention_title: Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information
privacy_retention_desc: The company processes and retains personal information within the personal information retention and use period under laws and regulations or the personal information retention and use period agreed upon when collecting personal information from the information subject.
privacy_retention_3: Records on contracts or withdrawal of subscription: 5 years
privacy_retention_4: Records on payment and supply of goods: 5 years
privacy_retention_5: Records on consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years
privacy_third_party_title: Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
privacy_third_party_desc: The company processes personal information of the information subject only within the scope specified in Article 1 (Purpose of Personal Information Processing), and provides personal information to third parties only when the information subject's consent, special provisions of laws, etc. correspond to Articles 17 and 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
privacy_entrustment_desc: The company entrusts personal information processing tasks as follows for smooth personal information work processing.
privacy_rights_title: Rights and Obligations of Information Subject and Method of Exercise
privacy_rights_desc: Users can exercise the following rights as personal information subjects.
privacy_rights_1: Request for access to personal information
privacy_rights_2: Request for correction in case of errors
privacy_destruction_desc: The company destroys the relevant personal information without delay when personal information becomes unnecessary due to the expiration of the personal information retention period or achievement of the processing purpose.
privacy_security_title: Measures to Ensure Safety of Personal Information
privacy_security_desc: The company takes the following safety measures in accordance with Article 29 of the Personal Information Protection Act.
privacy_security_4: Minimization and education of personal information handling staff
privacy_officer_desc: The company is responsible for overseeing personal information processing work and has designated a personal information protection officer as follows for handling complaints and damage relief of information subjects related to personal information processing.
privacy_changes_desc: This privacy policy applies from the effective date, and if there are additions, deletions, or corrections to the content due to laws and policies, the changes will be notified through announcements 7 days before the implementation of the changes.
our_story_desc: Check out SONAVERSE's innovative journey and various stories
search_description: Search for the information you need
products_intro: Introducing innovative healthcare products developed based on actual user experience
products_description: We provide a better quality of life
quality_desc: Reliability through strict quality control and certification
innovation_desc: Innovative solutions applying the latest technology
user_centered_desc: Design based on actual user experience
bodeum_diaper_description: Reliable quality adult diaper developed based on actual user experience
manbo_problems_desc: Market research revealed actual problems experienced by users.
manbo_problem_1_desc: Increased accident risk due to insufficient braking and propulsion on irregular terrain
manbo_problem_2_desc: Lack of reflection on seniors' body types, motor abilities, and usage habits
manbo_problem_3_desc: Lack of consideration for seniors' emotional stability and self-esteem
manbo_problem_4: Technology Blind Spots in the Aging Era
manbo_problem_4_desc: Delayed market progress as the pace of adopting AI/sensor tech among seniors and daily-life-needed tech are not applied
manbo_features_title: Next-Generation Hybrid Walkmate with Dual Drive System
manbo_features_desc: Enhanced safety with differentiated design of bar handles and cylindrical frames
manbo_feature_1_desc: Freely choose between electric and manual modes to flexibly respond to various walking environments
manbo_feature_2_desc: Smart control function providing propulsion uphill and braking downhill for stable walking on slopes
manbo_feature_3_desc: Application of fine motors that operate precisely according to user's strength and speed
manbo_smart_title: Intelligent Care Technology with Both Prevention and Response Functions
manbo_smart_1_desc: Sensor-responsive brake type that stops immediately in emergency situations, effectively blocking sudden accidents
manbo_smart_2_desc: Real-time monitoring through GPS-based location tracking system to prevent disappearance of high-risk groups such as dementia patients
manbo_timeline_title: Current Development and Product Lineup Commercialization Plan
manbo_timeline_desc: 1st prototype production and 1st performance evaluation completed, currently making 2nd prototype, targeting June 2026 launch
manbo_business_title: Scalable Business Model Based on B2B
manbo_cta_title: Providing New Experiences with Innovative Walking Aids
manbo_cta_desc: Manbo Walkmate for Safe and Comfortable Walking
main_sonaverse_story_desc: Discover SONAVERSE's journey of innovation and deep insights on senior life
main_growth_desc: We have been growing continuously since our establishment in 2022.
main_continuing_desc: SONAVERSE's challenge to innovate senior life continues.
main_press_desc: Check out the latest news about SONAVERSE and major coverage in the media
